definition: to cultivate/to breed/to foster/to nurture/to educate/to groom (for a position)/education/fostering/culture (biology)
to bank up with earth/to cultivate (lit. or fig.)/to train (people)
to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth

sentences.english: The educational aim of Huijia School is to "be a great Chinese".
sentences.chinese: 匯佳學校的培養目標是“做一個偉大的中國人”。

sentences.english: Objectives To explore the training method of comprehensive competence for junior nurses in burn department.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討燒傷科新護士綜合護理能力的培養方法。

sentences.english: Filtrates produced from antagonistic bacteria were also inhibitory to growth of V. dahliae.
sentences.chinese: 這些拮抗菌的培養濾液也能抑制棉花黃萎菌的生長。

sentences.english: Accounting major cultivates applied talents with high comprehensive quality, strong professional skills.
sentences.chinese: 會計專業培養綜合素質高，專業技能強的應用型人才。

sentences.english: Objective To study the cultural characteristics of Armillaria mellea (A. mellea )on solid media.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究蜜環菌的固體培養特性。

sentences.english: But developing awareness is not connected with having the eyes closed.
sentences.chinese: 但是，培養覺性與閉眼睛是沒有關連的。

sentences.english: Cultures from the samples were grown on two sorts of media.
sentences.chinese: 樣本細菌接著放在兩種不同環境中培養。

sentences.english: A preliminary study on the mycelial pure culture conditions of cenococcum geophilum fr.
sentences.chinese: 菌絲體純培養條件的初步研究。

sentences.english: When necessary in these parts take discharge for mould anti-bma or training.
sentences.chinese: 必要時要在這些部位取分泌物作黴菌鏡檢或培養。

sentences.english: Since its founding, has received more than 400 foreign students trained people.
sentences.chinese: 建校以來，先後接受培養了外國留學生400餘人。

sentences.english: Methods The hypertrophic scar fibroblasts were cultured with tissue culture method.
sentences.chinese: 方法用組織塊法培養人瘢痕成纖維細胞。

sentences.english: So, make the original powder of powder culture medium for manufacture.
sentences.chinese: 這樣就製造出乾粉培養基的原粉。

sentences.english: A liquid stationary culture method is applied to culture mushroom in semicontinuous culture system.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了一種用於食用菌培養的液體靜置培養方法。

sentences.english: A liquid stationary culture method is applied to culture mushroom in semicontinuous culture system.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了一種用於食用菌培養的液體靜置培養方法。

sentences.english: He restored the traditional chanting and created more opportunities for monastics to propagate the Dharma by means of chanting.
sentences.chinese: 不但恢復傳統梵唄也同時培養了更多梵唄高僧來傳播。

sentences.english: Experiment of culturing Tricholoma giganteum by using rapeseed coat as culture material was carried out.
sentences.chinese: 用菜籽皮作培養料進行了巨大口蘑的栽培對比試驗。

definition: to extend/to spread/to popularize/generalization/promotion (of a product etc)
to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
to create/to bring about/to produce/to set (a record)
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
